title: NEL service delayed due to signal train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 信号列车故障导致 NEL 服务延误
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan NEL tertangguh kerana kerosakan kereta isyarat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னல் ரயில் கோளாறு காரணமாக NEL சேவை தாமதமானது

updates.text: 24/03, 8.50am: NEL svc has resumed at Harbourfront NE1. All train services has resumed.
24/03, 8.44am: NEL svc is delayed due to a Signaling fault at Harbourfront NE1. Additional travel time of abt 10 minutes may be expected.
24/03, 8.31am: NEL svc is delayed due to a Signaling fault at Harbourfront NE1. Additional travel time of abt 15 minutes may be expected.
